alert.note: Alert for Southeast Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 25 at 12:39PM AKST until January 28 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches possible. * WHERE...Southeast Prince William Sound. * WHEN...From Friday evening through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to develop Friday afternoon with periods of heavy snow possible Friday night through Saturday morning. The snow is then expected to diminish in intensity Saturday morning through Saturday afternoon. A second round of heavy snow is then expected Saturday evening through Sunday morning before slowly tapering off through the day Sunday. Temperatures Saturday are expected to climb into the lower 30s. Warming temperatures may allow rain to mix in with the snow at times. Snow amounts may be reduced if there are any extended periods of rain/snow mix.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
